text:
Parents of Marimuthu of Raja Street in Kitchipalayam have preferred a complaint with the police to probe his death. Marimuthu was working in a plastics company and he was declared brought dead at the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital on Saturday. His co-workers took him to the hospital when he fell during work at night. A post-mortem examination would be held on Monday.

Campaign

As part of 27th Road Safety Week, Bachelor of Social Service Trust would create awareness among citizens near the New Bus Stand signal here on Monday about crossing roads.

Seminar

A seminar on ‘Industrial safety and accident prevention’ would be held at the Salem Productivity Council Bhawan near New Bus Stand on January 30. S. Sethupathy, senior consultant, Excellent HR Training Academy is the resource person. For details contact phone: 0427-4037295, 94877-57295 or 94437-17295.

Two held

Two persons who were involved in burglaries in the town were arrested on Sunday. The arrested were: Mohan and Gopi of Kosavampatti.
title: Probe death: petition
